name: NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Chocolate Chip Pie
author: Nestle Toll House
summary: NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Chocolate Chip Pie features the sweet, creamy richness of a brown sugar base combined with chopped nuts and delicious chocolate morsels. Serve warm with whipped or ice cream.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) unbaked (4-cup volume) deep-dish pie shell*
1 cup NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels
1 teaspoon Sweetened whipped cream or ice cream
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Beat eggs in large mixer bowl on high speed until foamy
Beat in flour, granulated sugar, and brown sugar
Bake for 55 to 60 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between edge and center comes out clean
Serve warm with whipped cream, if desired
